data.label: OvenPlayer
data.description: OvenPlayer是一个基于JavaScript的播放器，可以播放为OvenMediaEngine优化的低延迟HLS（LLHLS）和WebRTC流。它提供了各种API，使您可以更轻松地构建和操作您的媒体服务。

data.label: OvenPlayer
data.description: OvenPlayer is a JavaScript-based Player that can play Low Latency HLS (LLHLS) and WebRTC streams optimized for OvenMediaEngine. It provides various APIs, so you can build and operate your media service more easily.
